data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Machado, Miguel, Teixeira, Renato Augusto, Lise, Arno Antonio (2018): There and back again: More on the taxonomy of the crab spiders genus Epicadus (Thomisidae: Stephanopinae). Zootaxa 4382 (3): 501-530, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4382.3.4|115 occurrences
